name: Action Smacktion Monthly Challenge Generator
description:
The Universe around us started with a big bang, but your new universe starts with a challenge!

The Action Smacktion Monthly Challenge Generator is here to give creators a starting point to sharing the stories we often keep to ourselves.

Input all your headcanon characters and places as well as the story genres you want to see them in and the type of media you like to create. The Action Smacktion Monthly Generator will then give you a challenging prompt by randomly selecting your main characters, an essential locale, the narrative genre and the type of media. 

Challenges are hard, but they expand your horizons!

  • Diversify your creative portfolio with prompts outside your comfort zone
  • Practice project management and setting scope
  • Get a head start in starting your personal headcanon universe building or expand on your favorite universe with fanfiction.
  • Ready for a challenge but don’t have characters, places, genres, or media to start with? Use Action Smacktion!

The sky's the limit, but remember, you have only 1 month to tell the story in your heart!

To see the Action Smacktion Monthly Challenge Generator in ACTION and learn about the Action Smacktion Universe, subscribe to Action Smacchan!

https://www.youtube.com/@actionsmacchan
